info.name: Phoenix Abyss
info.description: Completely dark theme for Phoenixed forums. (https://phoenix.corvidae.org/)
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

V1.2.
 - Made modifications to the forms/primary buttons.
 - Fixed the profiles page in which the tabs appear with fragments of the pre-existing theme.

V1.1.

 - Fixed colour scheme on navbar


V1.0.
